summary: Completed testing of HackLidoLearn cybersecurity platform. Backend APIs are working well (86.7% success rate) with authentication, roadmaps, rooms, challenges, and admin functionality operational. Frontend has critical compilation errors preventing app from loading due to babel-metadata-plugin infinite recursion.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects room_id as query parameter instead of JSON body
minor_bugs.impact: Lab start functionality fails with 422 error

minor_bugs.issue: Expects room_id as query parameter instead of JSON body

critical_bugs.issue: Maximum call stack size exceeded - infinite recursion between analyzeMemberExpression (line 630) and getArrayIterationContext (line 973)
critical_bugs.impact: Frontend compilation fails completely, black screen for users

compilation_issues.issue: Babel plugin causing infinite loop when processing .map() operations in React components
affected_selectors: All frontend components with array mapping

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix babel-metadata-plugin infinite recursion in /app/frontend/plugins/visual-edits/babel-metadata-plugin.js. The plugin enters infinite loop when analyzing .map() operations in React components. Either disable the plugin, add recursion protection, or fix the circular call between analyzeMemberExpression and getArrayIterationContext functions. Also fix API endpoints to accept room_id as query parameter for labs/start and flags/submit.
